description: Manage Azure Cosmos DB for PostgreSQL coordinator configurations.

commands.name: az cosmosdb postgres configuration coordinator show
commands.summary: Get information of a configuration for coordinator.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb postgres configuration coordinator show [--cluster-name]
                                                    [--configuration-name]
                                                    [--ids]
                                                    [--resource-group]
                                                    [--subscription]
examples: az cosmosdb postgres configuration coordinator show -n "array_nulls" --cluster-name "test-cluster" -g "testGroup" --subscription "ffffffff-ffff-ffff-ffff-ffffffffffff"

commands.name: az cosmosdb postgres configuration coordinator update
commands.summary: Updates configuration of coordinator in a cluster.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb postgres configuration coordinator update [--cluster-name]
                                                      [--configuration-name]
                                                      [--ids]
                                                      [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                      [--resource-group]
                                                      [--subscription]
                                                      [--value]
examples: az cosmosdb postgres configuration coordinator update -n "array_nulls" --value "off" --cluster-name "test-cluster" -g "testGroup" --subscription "ffffffff-ffff-ffff-ffff-ffffffffffff"

commands.name: az cosmosdb postgres configuration coordinator wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb postgres configuration coordinator wait [--cluster-name]
                                                    [--configuration-name]
                                                    [--created]
                                                    [--custom]
                                                    [--deleted]
                                                    [--exists]
                                                    [--ids]
                                                    [--interval]
                                                    [--resource-group]
                                                    [--subscription]
                                                    [--timeout]
                                                    [--updated]
